tool_description: Monitors product availability and inventory status across e-commerce platforms, detecting stock changes and availability patterns.

product_urls.description: Product page URLs to check for availability

check_variants.description: Whether to check availability of product variants

notification_on_change.description: Generate notification when stock status changes

error_messages: Invalid URL format: One or more URLs are not valid HTTP/HTTPS addresses.
URL limit exceeded: Maximum 50 URLs can be checked in a single request.
Page load failed: Unable to access one or more product pages.
Stock information not found: Cannot locate inventory status on the product page.
Empty URL list: At least one product URL must be provided.
usage: Provide array of product URLs to check inventory status. Enable check_variants to include product variants, and notification_on_change for stock change alerts.

stock_statuses.description: Stock status for each checked URL (in_stock, out_of_stock, limited_stock, unknown)

last_checked.description: Timestamp when inventory was last checked

changes_detected.description: Whether any stock status changes were detected
